usefulItems: baking paper, baking tray (20 x 30 cm), silicone bread mat, rolling pin, cookie cutter, oven
title: Broccoli and blue cheese soup

ingredients.content: 70 g Parmesan cheese, crust removed and cut into cubes (3 cm)
2 sprigs fresh rosemary, (approx. 10 cm long), leaves only
⅛ tsp ground black pepper, to taste
50 g cheddar cheese, cut into cubes (3 cm)
1 - 2 pinches ground black pepper, to serve

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C. Line a baking tray (20 x 30 cm) with baking paper and set aside.
Place Parmesan and rosemary into mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place macadamias into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>.
Add all remaining biscuit ingredients, including reserved Parmesan mixture, and blend <b>7 sec/speed 7<b>.
Transfer dough onto a floured silicone bread mat or work surface and knead lightly.
Roll out dough, then cut into 20 rounds using a cookie cutter.
Place rounds onto prepared baking tray and bake for 8 minutes (180°C), or until biscuits are lightly golden brown. Set aside to cool. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place cheddar cheese into mixing bowl and grate <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place broccoli into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add water and stock paste and cook <b>12 min/90°C/speed 1<b>.
Add milk and flour and blend <b>15 sec/speed 6<b>.
Add blue cheese and reserved grated cheddar cheese and cook <b>3 min 30 sec/90°C/speed 1<b>, then blend <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>, <b>increasing speed gradually to speed 8<b>.
Season with pepper and serve with Macadamia and Parmesan biscuits.

hintsAndTricks: Please refer to The Basic Cookbook or the Everyday Cookbook for the Vegetable stock paste recipe.
